FuncDef:
The radius-server authorization port command configures the port number of a RADIUS authorization server.
The undo radius-server authorization port command restores the default configuration. The radius-server authorization port command configures the port number of a RADIUS authorization server. The undo radius-server authorization port command restores the default configuration. By default, the port ID of the RADIUS authorization server is 3799.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the port ID of the RADIUS authorization server.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1024 to 55535. The default value is 3799.
